Articles.Content: Anybody else watching it and making mental notes? Lol.
This show is really good. I've watched all the episodes and try to catch them whenever they're on. This morning I watched Tank on the Moon, which is a documentary about the Soviet moon rovers.

I've watched most of them on YouTube. Even though I've read a lot about Apollo they were still entertaining.

The YouTube comments from conspiracy nuts aren't so entertaining so I never scroll down to look now...
Moon Machines is a great show, learned a lot from it that I didn't know before about the Apollo missions.
